hero.name: Victor
hero.description: I build responsive web applications with modern technologies. Passionate about creating clean, efficient code and delivering exceptional user experiences.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Fullstack Developer passionate about creating exceptional web experiences
about.paragraph1: I'm a dedicated fullstack developer with expertise in both frontend and backend technologies. With a strong foundation in Angular, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, and CSS3 on the frontend, and Java and C# on the backend, I bring a comprehensive skill set to every project.
about.paragraph2: My approach combines technical excellence with creative solutions. I'm passionate about building scalable, maintainable applications that deliver exceptional user experiences while meeting business objectives.
about.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, you can find me playing video games, working out at the gym, or playing soccer. I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest technologies and best practices.

skills.description: I've developed expertise in various technologies across the full stack development spectrum. Here are the key skills I bring to every project.

projects.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. Each project showcases my skills and experience in different areas of web development.

contact.title: Get in
contact.description: Have a project in mind or want to discuss potential opportunities? I'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below or reach out directly through the provided contact information.

form.name: Your Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Your message has been sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon.
form.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again later.

footer.title: A fullstack developer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences with modern technologies.
